Posts.Content: Jan 22, 2012 01:06PM belfastgirl wrote: Hi Deeze...I have also had a rash on face with the same drug tyverb, it turns out this isnt acne, it is a rash that is caused by the sun, I checked the GSK web page, the researchers have run tests on a lot of patients receiving tyverb and they have concluded that this rash isnt permenant, can be treated very well with a gel CLINDAMYCIN antibotic....I got my gel last week and all my spots have gone...ask doc...hope this helps...carol
Posts.Title: Tykerb-Evil Rash Deeze tooyoungtohavebc
